doc.course_name: Additional Tools Used for Data Visualization
doc.course_introduction: This course will expose learners to additional tools that can be used to perform Data Visualization. In particular, the courses focuses on Tableau, a state-of-the-art visualization package. In this course, the visualization concepts from previous courses are reinforced and the Tableau software is introduced through replication of the visualizations built in previous courses.
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['About the Course', 'Best Practices for Online Learning', 'What will I be able to do when I complete this course?', 'Technology Tools', 'Learning Journey Syllabus'], ['Tableau Example 1: Loading Data Into Tableau', 'Tableau Example 2: Creating Common Data Visualizations in Tableau'], ['Advanced Visualizations', 'Tableau Example 4: Creating Time Series Data Visualizations Within Tableau', 'Geographic Visualizations in Tableau', 'Tree Maps']]
